TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CatalogPartCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class CatalogPartCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含 控件的集合，这些控件用于提供最终用户可添加到网页的 Web 服务器控件目录。

span.span: Contains a collection of controls used to provide catalogs of Web server controls that end users can add to a Web page.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是控件的只读集合 ，通常由 区域用于跟踪 区域包含的控件集。The class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by a zone to track the set of controls contained by the zone. 当 Web 部件页面进入目录模式时，区域将创建由 控件组成的新对象 。When a Web Parts page enters catalog mode, the zone creates a new object consisting of the controls. 集合中的每个 控件都可以包含对零个或多个 Web 服务器控件的引用，这些控件以可用服务器控件目录的形式显示。Each control in the collection can contain references to zero or more Web server controls, which are displayed in the form of a catalog of available server controls. 例如，如果需要对一组控件执行一些大容量操作，则可以为自己的编程使用创建控件的集合 。You can create a collection of controls for your own programmatic use if, for example, you need to perform some mass operation on a set of controls. 即使 对象是只读的，你也可以对集合中引用的基础控件进行编程更改。Even though the object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the underlying controls referenced in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了类的几个用途 。The following code example demonstrates several uses of the class. 此代码示例分为四个部分：There are four parts to this code example: - 使您能够在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 一个名为的自定义控件的类 ，该控件 `TextDisplayWebPart` 在网页中引用，并包含在一个 控件中。A class for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page and is contained in one of the controls. - 一个引用控件的网页 `TextDisplayWebPart` ，包含一个控件， 其中包含 区域中声明的 Web 部件控件集的两个控件，并包含用于创建和操作对象的事件驱动代码 。A Web page that references the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, contains a control with two of the controls from the Web Parts control set declared in the zone, and contains event-driven code to create and manipulate a object. - 说明如何在浏览器中加载代码示例。An explanation of how the code example works when you load it in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control. 该用户控件的源代码来自其他主题。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 要使此代码示例正常运行，你需要从 [演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) 主题中获取该用户控件的 .ascx 文件，并将该文件放在此代码示例中 .aspx 页面所在的同一文件夹中。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 此代码示例的第二部分是 `TextDisplayWebPart` 控件。The second part of the code example is the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 要使代码示例运行，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示两种编译方法的演练，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 请注意，控件有一个名为的属性 `ContentText` ; 此属性保存用户在文本框中输入的值。Note that the control has a property named `ContentText`; this property holds the value that the user enters in the text box. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 此代码示例的第三部分是网页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 请注意， `` 页面的元素包含两个控件的声明 。Notice that the `` element for the page contains declarations for two controls. 这些控件将成为 执行方法时创建的自定义对象的一部分 `Button1_Click` 。These controls become part of a custom object that is created when the `Button1_Click` method executes. 控件包含之前已由用户关闭的 Web 服务器控件。The control contains Web server controls that have been previously closed by a user at run time. 控件中的控件 可以添加回页面。Controls in the control can be added back to a page. 控件包含自定义控件的声明 `TextDisplayWebPart` 。The control contains a declaration of the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 当页处于目录模式时，用户可以将该控件添加 `TextDisplayWebPart` 到页面中，以便可以在正常浏览模式下使用该控件。When the page is in catalog mode, a user can add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page so that it can be used in normal browse mode. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#1)] 在浏览器中加载页面时，可以通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**目录**"，将页面切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以 通过选中控件旁边的复选框并单击 " **添加**"，将该自定义控件添加到该页。You can add the custom control to the page by selecting the check box next to it and clicking **Add**. 单击 " **关闭** " 可将该页返回到浏览模式。Click **Close** to return the page to browse mode. 在刚添加的控件上，如果单击谓词菜单 (在标题栏中显示的向下箭头) 然后单击 " **关闭**"，则将从页中移除控件并将其添加到 控件中。On the control you just added, if you click the verbs menu (the down arrow that appears in the title bar) and then click **Close**, the control is removed from the page and added to the control. 将页面返回到目录模式，然后单击 " **目录** " 链接以查看该控件的内容 。Return the page to catalog mode, and click the **Page Catalog** link to view the contents of the control. 请注意，您关闭的控件现在会显示在那里。Notice that the control you closed now appears there. 单击 " **显示 CatalogPart 属性** " 按钮将访问 对象并显示所包含控件的某些属性 。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含控件的区域 通常是通过方法创建对象的控件 。The zone that contains controls is typically the control that creates a object, through the method. 不过，您也可以创建自己 的对象来实现其他编程目的。However, you can also create your own object for other programmatic purposes.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新的空实例。

span.span: Initializes a new, empty instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化类的空实例 。The constructor initializes an empty instance of the class. 构造函数的此重载由类在内部由 类在内部使用 ，以创建一个空集合对象。This overload of the constructor is used internally by the class in its method to create an empty collection object. 然后，区域将创建 子区域模板中声明的所有控件的实例，并使用集合的内部方法添加它们。The zone then creates instances of all the controls declared in the child zone template, and uses an internal method of the collection to add them. 不能使用构造函数的此重载 来创建的新实例 ，并向 其添加控件。You cannot use this overload of the constructor to create a new instance of a and add controls to it. 您必须改用构造函数的其他重载之一 。You must use one of the other overloads for the constructor instead.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection catalogParts) cil managed

span.span: An of controls.

summary.span: 通过传入 控件的 集合，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by passing in an collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化类的实例 并传入控件的集合 。The constructor initializes an instance of the class and passes in a collection of controls. 这是构造函数的一个重载， 可用于创建新的 对象并向其中添加 控件。This is one overload of the constructor that you can use to create a new object and add controls to it. 尽管 构造函数创建的实例是只读的，但仍可 通过编程方式访问集合中的各个控件，并调用其属性和方法。Although the instance created by the constructor is read-only, you can still access the individual controls in the collection programmatically and call their properties and methods. 使用此构造函数的一个常见方案是，如果要对整个控件集执行某个批处理操作 ，例如更改相关项组的内容、外观或位置。One common scenario for using this constructor would be if you want to perform some batch operation on an entire set of controls, such as changing the content, appearance, or position of a related group of items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义 ，以及如何执行批处理操作来更改集合中的各个 控件，即使它是只读的。The following code example demonstrates how you can create a custom , and perform a batch operation to change the individual controls in the collection even though it is read-only. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 方法中的代码 `Button1_Click` 创建一个 对象，将页面中的两个 控件添加到对象中，然后 使用构造函数创建新的对象 。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates an object, adds the two controls in the page to the object, and then creates a new object using the constructor. 它还演示了如何对基础控件进行批处理更改 ，即使集合本身是只读的。It also demonstrates how you can make batch changes to the underlying controls, even though the collection itself is read-only. 代码循环遍历集合，并更新 每个控件的属性。The code loops through the collection, updating the property of each control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面时，可以通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**目录**"，将页面切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 单击 " **显示 CatalogPart 属性** " 按钮将访问 对象并显示所包含控件的某些属性 。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 此外，如果将鼠标指针放在控件边框内的标题文本上 ，则可以看到在单击按钮时添加到控件中的新说明文本 (说明显示在 ToolTip) 中。Also, if you position your mouse pointer over the title text within the border of the control, you can see the new description text that was added to the control when you clicked the button (the description appears in a ToolTip). 如果单击 " **目录** " 链接以显示 控件，您会发现它还具有更新说明。If you click the **Page Catalog** link to display the control, you will find that it also has an updated description.

span.span: A that is checked to determine whether it is in the collection.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示集合中是否存在特定控件。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether a particular control exists in the collection.

returns.span: 一个布尔值，该值指示集合中是否存在特定控件。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法可以确定特定 对象是否为对象的一部分 。The method enables you to determine whether a particular object is part of a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定特定 控件是否为对象的成员 。The following code example demonstrates how you can determine whether a particular control is a member of a object. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 方法中的代码 `Button1_Click` 创建一个 名为的新对象 `myParts` 。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates a new object named `myParts`. 方法使用 方法来确定 `PageCatalogPart1` 控件是否存在，如果是，则检索控件并更改属性值。The method uses the method to determine whether the `PageCatalogPart1` control exists, and if so, retrieves the control and changes a property value. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面时，可以通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**目录**"，将页面切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 通过选中控件旁边的复选框并单击 "**添加**"，将该自定义控件添加到该页。Add the custom control to the page by selecting the check box next to it and clicking **Add**. 单击 " **关闭** " 可将该页返回到浏览模式。Click **Close** to return the page to browse mode. 在刚添加的控件上，如果单击谓词菜单 (在标题栏中显示的向下箭头) 然后单击 " **关闭**"，则将从页中移除控件并将其添加到 控件中。On the control you just added, if you click the verbs menu (the down arrow that appears in the title bar) and then click **Close**, the control is removed from the page and added to the control. 将页面返回到目录模式，然后单击 " **目录** " 链接以查看该控件的内容 。Return the page to catalog mode, and click the **Page Catalog** link to view the contents of the control. 请注意，您关闭的控件已添加到其中。Notice that the control you closed has been added to it. 单击 " **显示 CatalogPart 属性** " 按钮将访问 对象并显示所包含控件的某些属性 。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 选中控件中包含的服务器控件旁边的复选框 ，然后单击 " **添加** " 以将其添加回页面，然后单击 " **关闭** " 将该页返回到浏览模式。Select the check box next to the server control contained in the control, click **Add** to add it back to the page, and then click **Close** to return the page to browse mode. 再次单击控件上的谓词菜单，并注意现在关闭谓词已消失。Click the verbs menu again on the control, and note that now the close verb is gone. 它已由方法中的代码移除， `Button1_Click` 当它使用 方法检查 `PageCatalogPart1` ，然后将其 属性设置为时 `false` 。It was removed by the code in the `Button1_Click` method, when it used the method to check for `PageCatalogPart1`, and then set its property to `false`.

.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart[] array, int32 index) cil managed
Public Sub CopyTo (array As CatalogPart(), index As Integer)
public: void CopyTo(cli::array <System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::CatalogPart ^> ^ array, int index);

param.name: array

param.name: index
param.span: 在数组中放置集合内容的起始点。

span.span: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.

summary.span: 将集合复制到 对象的数组。

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要组合可包含对象中的控件的自定义数组 或这些控件的子集，则方法非常有用。The method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain the controls in the object, or a subset of those controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Empty As CatalogPartCollection

summary.span: 引用集合的一个空的静态只读实例。

span.span: References a static, read-only, empty instance of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 你希望空集合实例从方法返回适当的对象类型，或将实例与其他对象进行比较，但不需要将成员添加到实例，则静态的只读空实例可减少内存使用量。A static, read-only, empty instance of reduces memory usage in cases where you want an empty collection instance to return the proper object type from a method or to compare the instance with another object, but you do not need to add members to the instance.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart catalogPart) cil managed
Public Function IndexOf (catalogPart As CatalogPart) As Integer

span.span: A that is a member of the collection.

summary.span: 返回集合中特定成员的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
A that is a member of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Web 部件页面上有多个控件，并且需要在集合中查找特定的控件，则方法非常有用。The method is useful if you have multiple controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to locate a particular control in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 通过使用其属性来确定集合成员的位置 。The following code example demonstrates how you can determine the position of a member of a collection by using its property. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 方法中的代码 `Button1_Click` 创建一个 名为的新对象 `myParts` 。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates a new object named `myParts`. 方法使用 属性来检索控件的位置 ，然后更改控件上的属性值。The method uses the property to retrieve the position of the control, and then changes a property value on the control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面后，可以通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**目录**"，将页面切换到目录模式。After you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 单击 " **显示 CatalogPart 属性** " 按钮将访问 对象并显示所包含控件的某些属性 。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 单击 " **目录** " 链接以显示控件的内容 。Click the **Page Catalog** link to display the contents of the control. 请注意，它只有一个标题，没有边框，因为 在使用该属性检索控件的代码中，其属性值已更改为 。Note that it has only a title and no border, because its property value was changed to in the code that used the property to retrieve the control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 根据位置或唯一标识符返回集合中的特定成员。

span.span: Returns a specific member of the collection according to its position or a unique identifier.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(index As Integer) As CatalogPart

param.name: index
param.span: 集合中特定 的索引。

span.span: The index of a particular in the collection.

summary.span: 基于集合中的位置获取或设置集合的成员。

span.span: Gets or sets a member of the collection, based on its position in the collection.

value.span: 位于集合中指定索引处的 。

span.span: A at the specified index in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用索引 器可以 按索引访问对象中的基础控件 ，并可以更改其属性值或调用方法。The indexer allows you to access the underlying controls in a object by index, and change their property values or call methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象的索引来访问该 对象的成员。The following code example demonstrates how you can access a member of a object using its index. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 方法中的代码 `Button1_Click` 创建一个 名为的新对象 `myParts` 。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates a new object named `myParts`. 请注意，该方法使用 索引器从集合的第一个成员中检索信息。Note that the method uses the indexer to retrieve information from the first member of the collection. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面时，可以通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**目录**"，将页面切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 单击 " **显示 CatalogPart 属性** " 按钮将访问 对象并显示所包含控件的某些属性 。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 使用方法中的索引器可获取控件内可用服务器控件的计数 `Button1_Click` 。The count of available server controls within the control is obtained by using the indexer in the `Button1_Click` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引器允许您 通过使用字符串标识符来访问对象中的基础控件。The indexer allows you to access the underlying controls in a object by use of a string identifier. 尽管 对象是只读的，但您可以更改属性值或调用索引器访问的基础控件上的方法。Although the object is read-only, you can change the property values or call methods on the underlying controls accessed by the indexer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用对象的字符串 ID 值访问该对象的成员。The following code example demonstrates how you can access a member of a object using its string ID value. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码，请参阅类概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 方法中的代码 `Button1_Click` 创建一个 名为的新对象 `myParts` 。The code in the `Button1_Click` method creates a new object named `myParts`. 方法使用 索引器检索有关控件的信息 ，这是集合的第二个成员。The method uses the indexer to retrieve information about the control, which is the second member of the collection. [!code-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/CS/catalogpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPartCollection_Overview/VB/catalogpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面时，可以通过在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**目录**"，将页面切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into catalog mode by selecting **Catalog** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 单击 " **显示 CatalogPart 属性** " 按钮将访问 对象并显示所包含控件的某些属性 。Clicking the **Display CatalogPart Properties** button accesses the object and displays certain properties of the contained controls. 使用方法中的索引器可获取控件内可用服务器控件的计数 `Button1_Click` 。The count of available server controls within the control is obtained by using the indexer in the `Button1_Click` method.
